name: Red and Blue's Adventure
description:
Play on Scratch Here

General Information:

Red: A marathon runner, but has weak knees (Fast, but low jump)

Blue: An Old Basketball Player (Slow, But High Jump)

Abilities:

Red: Fly!!! - Hold A while jumping and gravity will have no effect on you. The more mid-air you are when you use it, the slower you float! 

You can activate it by holding the A key

Blue: Teleport!!! - An amazing duo need amazing powers! Blue has the ability to swap places with Red!

You can activate it by pressing the B key
